summary: With this mod you can ride guars and create armies with these creatures … No DLC required
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can ride guars and create armies with these creatures ... No DLC required

[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18081203040616616015845101.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/08/12//18081203040616616015845101.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]ARMIES of GUARS[/size][/b][/color]


This mod adds the ability to quickly create armies of Guars (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these Guars, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [b]Whiterun [/b](Merchants: [i] Belethor at the Belethor's General Goods, Elrindir at the Drunken Huntsman, Carlotta[/i]) Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Guars...



[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]MOUNTS[/size][/b][/color]


1) You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 19 books (Normally this is done automatically)

You can find the “Spell tome XXXX",at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whitherun) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell Tome: Dismiss Guars"

If you have not bought the book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the book, etc

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not



In order to find the scrolls or books at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.



[color=#ff0000][b] [size=3]Credits[/size][/b][/color]

Mihail Romanov for the guars in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80087?] Guars of Solstheim- Dunmer Culture pt.1 (Mihail Immersive Add-ons- Morrowind- Mount) [/url]

mdogger for the mesh and texture of the Guar A in the mod of Dogtown1 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35631/] Skyrim Monster Mod [/url]
